backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing an e-commerce backend with product, order, cart, and user profile management, including authorization mixins and access control for admin and user operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of an informational section on the admin products page that explains the product upload workflow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and styling for the e-commerce application with admin functionality and user authentication.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining design tokens for light and dark themes using warm earth tones.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for product catalog, checkout, order confirmation, and admin pages with theme provider and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that verifies user authentication and admin privileges, displaying appropriate error messages and redirects for unauthorized access.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart component displaying cart items with images, prices, total calculation, and actions for checkout and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx: Header cart button with item count badge that opens a sheet panel containing the full cart component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with sticky header navigation, conditional admin links, cart button, login button, user profile setup modal, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, using the useInternetIdentity hook and clearing the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: A modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, blocking interaction until profile setup is complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing identity state and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including products, cart, orders, and user profiles with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm earth-toned color scheme for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrders.tsx: Admin page displaying all customer orders in expandable cards with product details, images, and total prices, showing empty state when no orders exist.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProducts.tsx: Admin page for managing products with CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) including form handling for product details, image uploads, and validation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page that displays cart items, collects shipping information via form, validates input, and processes orders with navigation to order confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page that displays order details, purchased items with images, and total price after successful checkout.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Product catalog page with hero banner that displays all products in a grid layout and allows authenticated users to add items to cart.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage, supporting both regular and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file for an e-commerce website called 'Business Store' with 7 completed features including product catalog, shopping cart, checkout, admin interface with Internet Identity auth, and professional design theme. Contains one pending feature request for creating the e-commerce website foundation.
